text: Vasily Nikolayevich Likhachyov (; 5 January 1952 â€“ 8 April 2019) was a Russian politician. He served as the Permanent Representative for Russia to the European Council, and as Deputy Minister of Justice. He was also vice- president of the federal subject of Tatarstan. From 2011 until his death, he was a State Duma deputy for the Communist Party of the Russian Federation. Likhachyov was born in Gorky (now known as Nizhny Novgorod). Likhachyov died on 8 April 2019, at the age of 67. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Russian communist politicians Category:Politicians from Nizhny Novgorod Category:Members of the State Duma
title: Vasily Likhachyov
